synopsis: In episode #13, Devam shares his transformative journey after quitting his job, exploring the importance of self-discovery and mental health. He reflects on his travels, new hobbies like DJing, and the significance of taking a break to reconnect with oneself, all while encouraging listeners to embrace their own paths.
quotes: Sometimes it takes an incredible amount of courage and privilege to leap into the unknown.
We're not on this planet to slave away and be like productivity monkeys creating value for our bosses.
I realized it would be fun to check in and give you guys an update and talk about some cool things.
The goal of this break is to learn how to breathe and build a healthy relationship with my hobbies.
You can make a good show, but if the world isn't ready for it, it may not take off.
It's important to recognize why you're doing something and the context of your surroundings.
If you have privilege, you should use it to explore what you love.
I felt so much self-inflicted pressure to make progress on all these different things.
Sometimes it's enough to just breathe; that's okay.
If you have to give your life right now a book title, what would it be? Oh, I'm in transit.
